text: Jonathan Kendrick "Johnny" Lewis (October 29, 1983 â€“ September 26, 2012), or Johnny K. Lewis, was an American movie and television actor. He is known for his role as Kip "Half-Sack" Epps in Sons of Anarchy. Lewis was born on October 29, 1983 in Los Angeles, California. ==Death== On the morning of September 26, 2012, at the age of 28, Lewis was found dead in Los Angeles, California, after falling into the ground. Lewis is suspected of killing an 81-year-old woman, his landlady,Johnny Lewis Dead: 'Sons Of Anarchy' Actor Found Dead Outside Los Feliz Woman's Home The Huffington Post, September 27, 2012 And his death was ruled an injured fall. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1983 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:Accidental deaths in the United States Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Johnny Lewis
